categories: Category:Unidentified members of the Ohnaka Gang

nodes.text: A male Nikto was a member of the Ohnaka Gang and lived on the planet of Florrum in the pirate outpost during the time of the Clone Wars.

In 22 BBY, after the Pirates captured Count Dooku and Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi along with Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker arrived on the planet to confirm they have the Count, this Nikto was sitting at a bar when the Jedi were present. Suspecting there was a dangerous substance in their drinks, the Jedi switched the cups with others. This Nikto, unknown his drink had been switched, drank it, and collapsed, most likely from the substance. He was one of the few members of the gang who was not a Weequay; other known pirates who were not Weequay are an Ishi Tib and several other Nikto, as well as Bith and Jawas.
